p.italic: “Oh, even though I’m no sinner, I’m not perfect, I believe in God. Deeply. I listen to Gospel, music. This is keep me go- keep me everything- spiritual. So, it’s the Bible which- Keep me going. Even though I’m gay. This is- It’s what- Kept me going. I feel sad I cry, I’m not accepted, you know by, my own family my siblings, because I’m gay and a lot of things happen to me…”
